thread.title: Great Stay Here!
thread.title_full: Great Stay Here! - Review of Apostrophe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: novamatt
title: Great Stay Here!
text: We had a great stay at Apostrophe. Eugene was a great resource, helped us out (in English) finding our way, gave recommendations, and helped with some printing needs. I can't remember the lady's name that also helped us out, but merci to her as well! The hotel is in a great location with access to several metro stops, including the RER B from CDG airport. The room was small, but that was expected for any room in Paris or major cities. The shower is wonderful - the jets are so nice - really do give you a great massage!
